title: Pedagogical Evolution of Textbooks and Multimodal Media Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific theories and job-related fundamental concepts
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen self-directed learning using visual/auditory cues and question prompts in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Explain effective design principles for digital textbooks by combining multimedia elements (images, diagrams, verbal prompts)
Critically analyze textbook content applicable to science-related job problems based on formative assessment feedback
Produce educational materials integrating visual/textual interactive elements using mobile devices in resource-limited settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
